sources.title: Snowbeast
sources.description: A Colorado ski resort is besieged by a sub-human beast that commits brutal murders on the slopes. - IMDB Description

sources.title: Snowbeast (1977)
sources.description: A skier and his wife visit a friend's ski resort during a man beast's rampage, and must hide from the impending danger. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/snowbeast-1977/

metadata.Plot: In this made for TV film, an enormous and angry bigfoot creature begins to terrorize a Colorado Ski Resort during a winter carnival, by eating several skiers. At first everyone insists it is just a bear, until ski patrolman Tony Rill sees a white shadowy beastly shape disappearing into the woods. Although Tony's grandmother Mrs. Carrie Rill, who owns the Ski Resort and the town sheriff, Sheriff Paraday disagree, it soon becomes clear when the creature finally attacks the town.
metadata.Actors: Bo Svenson, Yvette Mimieux, Robert Logan
